message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier product.
